OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . Arm I ( Early exercise group ) : Patients perform swallow exercise comprise lingual press , head lift , breath hold , Masako swallow , high pitch e , effortful swallow , neck stretch massage 2 week prior begin radiotherapy immediately completion radiotherapy . Arm II ( Late exercise group ) : Patients begin perform swallowing exercise arm I 1 month completion radiotherapy . In arm , swallow exercise perform twice daily , 6 day week , 12 month follow completion radiotherapy .
